The codes are what /proc/acpi/event gets. The last number seems to be some sort of counter and it varies.
With the display-brightnesskeys, the first value varies within two different intervals as the screen goes darker/brighter.

http://sourceforge.net/projects/acpi4asus may have something good on this laptop and hotkeys.
